pr_title: [#1951] Close all command consumers on connection close

timeline.message:
[#1951] Close all command consumers on connection close.

Signed-off-by: Carsten Lohmann <carsten.lohmann@bosch.io>

timeline.bodyText: does ProtonConnection.attachments() always return a non-null value?
timeline.author: sophokles73

replies.bodyText: With the current Proton implementation classes, yes. And besides, it would be inconsistent having the null check here, but not in the many other places where the attachments are used.
